segments.text: I notice a boy precariously perched on a wobbly stool, stretching towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is almost admirable, but I can't shake off my worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he tips over and falls? It would be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yet, the thrill of stealing cookies seems to overshadow his caution.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his hand dive into the jar, fingers grabbing for those sweet treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how risk can be so enticing to children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the situation is so dangerous; I want to yell at him to get down!
segments.speaker: PAR
